{{Description|Beneath the frequent eruptions of volcanic flames, the warriors who thrive on fertile lands meet their trials head-on with raw strength.<br>Meanwhile, within the sacred mountain long shrouded in sulfurous veils, the one who forsook everything continues to wait for an ending to their ancient tale.}}
'''The Sacred Mountain and Sanctified Land''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.5 update – 2025/06/17 14:59

===Summary===
* New areas in [[Natlan]] including [[Atocpan]] and [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]] will be available after the Version 5.5 update.
* Complete the corresponding exploration missions within the specified duration to obtain an additional reward of [[Primogem]]s ×400.
